name: Horn of Balance (Pre-KS demo)
description:
"Horn of Balance" is an 2D Zelda-like all about vast non-linear dungeons and exploration. Join a young golem (plus a quirky skull) as they set out into the world in order to keep their friends and family safe from harm. 

This demo features one full early dungeon, good for about two hours of content. There is controller support, as well as an auto save system.

And if you beat the game and want more, be sure to also check out the project over on Kickstarter for more news in the future.

UPDATE: I've been requested to make the demo harder. Note that the difficulty has been lowered by design, because it is a demo. That being said, I am considering adding a hard mode. Let me know in the comments (or somewhere else on the internet) if there is more interest for that.

How to play

Simply extract the contents of the .zip file to a folder of your choosing and run the executable.
